Class ServerSide.UserList

java.lang.Object
ServerSide.UserList
Enclosing class:
ServerSide
public class ServerSide.UserList extends Object
Manages a list of users including operations to add, retrieve, and update users in the system and their corresponding data in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserList(String dataSource)
    Initializes a new UserList and loads existing users from the database.

      public ServerSide.User[] getUsersWithHighestScores(int amount)

      Parameters:
      amount - the number of top users to retrieve.
      Returns:
      an array of top-scoring users.

    • getCurrentUserScorePlacement

      public int getCurrentUserScorePlacement(ServerSide.User user)
      Returns the ranking position of a user based on their score.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose ranking is to be determined.
      Returns:
      the ranking position as an integer. Returns -1 if the user was not found.

    • awardPointsToUser

      public void awardPointsToUser(ServerSide.User user, int points)
      Awards points to a user and updates their score in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to award points to.
      points - the number of points to award.

    • isUserRegistered

      public boolean isUserRegistered(String username)
      Checks if a username is already registered in the system.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check.
      Returns:
      true if the username is already registered, false otherwise.

      Returns:
      the User object if found, null otherwise.

      Parameters:
